introduction.p1: Hi, I'm Silviu, I'm 24 years-old and I'm a passionate Frontend Developer. I am always looking for new projects / opportunities that allow me to improve. I'm proactive, curious and always take on new challenges with a positive attitude.
introduction.p2: Besides my professional work, I'm continuously seeking to learn more and adapt to the constant evolution of technologies in the Software Engineering branch by building personal projects and apps.
introduction.p3: Apart from my professional career and strong passion about web development, I'm also very interested about other things such as: photography, videography, travelling, video games and sports.

technologies.p1: When it comes to web technologies, I'm very passionate about everything that's out there, and since they are always changing, I try to keep up with the latest and greatest. Here are a few that I've worked with:

tlou.title: The Last Of Us
tlou.alt: The last of us image logo

hobbies.p1: In this section I'll be showcasing some of my hobbies mentioned above.
hobbies.p2: Some amazing titles that I love:
hobbies.p3: Speed skating is one of the most loved sports activities that I've practiced throughout my youth. Speed skating, though not that mainstream, is a character-building, competitive, and fun all-season activity that involves races using skates in the winter and roller-skates during warmer seasons.
hobbies.p4: During my 7-year speed skating career, I've obtained several awards for my performance, I've built strong friendships and connections and I developed a certain discipline that can only be obtained when practicing sports.

about.title: About
about.content: I am a curious and sociable person, able to work in a team or independently. I have nearly 2 years of working experience with the Web Development technologies. I always tend to exceed my expectations, and I am always passionate about any project I am working on. I like learning new things and following best practices.

responsibilities.item1: Actively engaged with our clients to ensure top-of-the-line services & consultancy through my work.
responsibilities.item2: Working with tools like: AngularJS, Angular, React, SCSS, NodeJS, Jira

responsibilities.item1: Aiding customers to build reliable WordPress websites
responsibilities.item2: Solving/reporting bugs and debugging (PHP, CSS, JavaScript, MySQL)

resumeApp.title: Resume / presentation website
resumeApp.description: A presentation app built for myself containing information like: resume, who am I and what I do, hobbies and more.

project1.title: React Weather App
project1.description: A weather app built with React and Express which enables the user to search theweather in certain cities around the world. The app automatically detects your locationand displays the weather information that is most relevant to you.

project2.title: Web Sockets Chat
project2.description: A web chat application built with React on the FE and socket.io running on the BE. Userscan connect to the chat room and exchange messages with each other.

project3.title: Url Shortener
project3.description: A web app created with VueJS and Express that enables the users to create shortURLs. (similar to bit.ly). The 'Copy to clipboard' feature might not work due to the fact that the SSL certificate expired (https -> http).

project4.title: Disease predictor
project4.description: I designed, trained and tested a Neural Network capable of receiving symptoms as input and predicting the disease that best matches the input. The trained model is the core component of the Backend server created with the help of Flask which I created for my own API capable of receiving symptoms from a Frontend instance and responding with the predicted disease.

project5.title: Smoke detector
project5.description: A smoke-detection system built using Python. When a certain value of gas or smoke is detected, I'm getting notified via email with a warning containing the details.

education1.company: Faculty of Automatic Control and Computer Science, POLITEHNICA University

education2.position: PROGRESSING TOWARDS A MASTER'S DEGREE IN ADVANCED SIGNAL PROCESSING
education2.company: Faculty of Automatic Control and Computer Science, POLITEHNICA University
